Convert gtsummary object to a kable object

Source: R/as_kable.R
as_kable.Rd

Function converts a gtsummary object to a knitr_kable object. This function is used in the background when the results are printed or knit. A user can use this function if they wish to add customized formatting available via knitr::kable.

Output from knitr::kable is less full featured compared to summary tables produced with gt. For example, kable summary tables do not include indentation, footnotes, or spanning header rows.

as_kable(
  x,
  include = everything(),
  return_calls = FALSE,
  group_header = NULL,
  exclude = NULL,
  ...
)

Arguments

x

Object created by a function from the gtsummary package (e.g. tbl_summary or tbl_regression)
include

Commands to include in output. Input may be a vector of quoted or unquoted names. tidyselect and gtsummary select helper functions are also accepted. Default is everything().
return_calls

Logical. Default is FALSE. If TRUE, the calls are returned as a list of expressions.
group_header

If a group is present (e.g. via tbl_merge(group_header=)), this string specifies the column header for the grouping column. Default is "**Group**"
exclude

DEPRECATED
...

Additional arguments passed to knitr::kable

Value

A knitr_kable object

Details

Tip: To better distinguish variable labels and level labels when indenting is not supported, try bold_labels() or italicize_levels().

See also

Other gtsummary output types: as_flextable.gtsummary(), as_gt(), as_kable_extra(), as_tibble.gtsummary()

Examples

trial %>%
  tbl_summary(by = trt) %>%
  bold_labels() %>%
  as_kable()
#> <table>
#>  <thead>
#>   <tr>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> **Characteristic** </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> **Drug A**, N = 98 </th>
#>    <th style="text-align:left;"> **Drug B**, N = 102 </th>
#>   </tr>
#>  </thead>
#> <tbody>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> __Age, yrs__ </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 46 (37 - 59) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 48 (39 - 56) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Unknown </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 7 </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 4 </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> __Marker Level, ng/mL__ </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 0.84 (0.24 - 1.57) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 0.52 (0.19 - 1.20) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Unknown </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 6 </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 4 </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> __T Stage__ </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;">  </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;">  </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> T1 </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 28 (29) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 25 (25) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> T2 </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 25 (26) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 29 (28) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> T3 </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 22 (22) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 21 (21) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> T4 </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 23 (23) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 27 (26) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> __Grade__ </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;">  </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;">  </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> I </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 35 (36) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 33 (32) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> II </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 32 (33) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 36 (35) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> III </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 31 (32) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 33 (32) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> __Tumor Response__ </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 28 (29) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 33 (34) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> Unknown </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 3 </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 4 </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> __Patient Died__ </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 52 (53) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 60 (59) </td>
#>   </tr>
#>   <tr>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> __Months to Death/Censor__ </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 23.5 (17.4 - 24.0) </td>
#>    <td style="text-align:left;"> 21.2 (14.6 - 24.0) </td>
#>   </tr>
#> </tbody>
#> </table>
